mapper.insert: insert into t_role (id, name, valid, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_role
id,
name,
valid,
gmt_create,
gmt_modify,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_role
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update t_role set deleteFlag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id in #{item}
